### Government Tender Announcement
#### Roofing Repairs at CFB Halifax-Debert Area, NS

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites qualified contractors to participate in a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for roofing repairs and installations at the Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax-Debert area in Nova Scotia.

#### Key Information
- ** Solicitation Number**: WS4604847979
- **Amendment Number**: 4
- **Publication Date**: 26 May 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: 16 July 2024, 2:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: 6 August 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date**: 7 August 2025

#### Service Description
The work under this requirement comprises the furnishing of all labour, material, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision required to perform repairs and installations of various types of roofing systems at the CFB Halifax-Debert area.

#### Geographic Scope
This tender is restricted to bidders who have their main office and principal place of business in Canada.

#### Anticipated Results
The successful bidder will be awarded a Standing Offer agreement with the Government of Canada for the provision of roofing services at various locations within the CFB Halifax-Debert area.

#### Contact Information
For further information, please contact:
Fesseha, Nicole (SPAC/PSPC)
email: [nicole.fesseha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nicole.fesseha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
